title: Chandler
description: Chandler... Over six feet of hard-boiled private eye with a talent for trouble and an eye for beauty, all rolled up in a wrinkled trenchcoat with a pocketful of bad luck.Chandler... A sucker, a suspect, a lover, a loser, a victim, and a hero with a ticket to hell.Chandler... In his first appearanceâ€”a high voltage manhunt to find a sadistic murderer without a face, on the loose in the night world on New York.Chandler... An exciting new concept by Steranko, award winning author and illustrator. Here is his first move-length visual novel, created in the tradition of Sam Spade and Philip Marlowe, a bare-knuckled mystery that will keep you guessing right up to the last page.
author: Jim Steranko
